name: www.silviatheo.eu
description: Silvia and Theo are getting married!
author: Theo Chatzimichos <tampakrap@gmail.com>

scripts.clean:src: rm -rf src/cz src/de src/el src/en src/es src/gr src/index.html src/css/style.* src/js/script.min.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:src && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build:html:minify: for lang in cz de en es gr; do mkdir -p dist/$lang && htmlmin -o dist/$lang/index.html src/$lang/index.html; done
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:compile && npm run build:css:prefix && npm run build:css:minify
scripts.build:src: npm run clean:src && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dist
